public MinestomExtensionClassLoader newClassLoader​(@NotNull
                                                   net.minestom.server.extensions.DiscoveredExtension extension,
                                                   @NotNull
                                                   java.net.URL[] urls)
        Creates a new class loader for the given extension. Will add the new loader as a child of all its dependencies' loaders.
        Parameters:
        urls - URL (usually a JAR) that should be loaded.
